A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: REALLY wanted to like this movie. However\, the biggest issue I had was the TERRIBLE mischaracterization of Luke and Yoda. Luke\, the young boy who refused to give in to the dark side and successfully turned his father\, would NEVER even consider killing his own nephew. And Yoda\, a leader on the Jedi Council and one of the wisest characters\, would NEVER tell Luke that the Jedi texts aren’t important and burn it down... The other thing that really bothered me was the comedy. IT WAS SO OUT OF PLACE. Not only was it not timed right\, but it wasn’t the right tone for Star Wars. I was kinda half expecting Iron Man to pop out at the end... It all comes down to BAD WRITING. This movie honestly makes TFA and even parts of the prequels feel like masterpieces.
